summary: Add text validation in Todo.from_dict() to reject empty and whitespace-only text, consistent with rename() and CLI add() methods.

changes.description: Add text validation in from_dict: strip text and raise ValueError if empty, use stripped text for Todo construction
Add regression tests for empty text, whitespace-only text, and text stripping in from_dict

risks: Existing code that relied on empty/whitespace text being accepted by from_dict will now raise ValueError
